short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to the National Capital Region by March 31, 2023
description: This notice of proposed procurement, NPP # PW-22-01019092, is issued pursuant to TPSGC Supply Arrangement (SA) no. E60PQ-120001/G. Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office seating to the National Capital Region by March 31, 2023. This requirement is exempt from the Trade Agreement in the procurement category Goods, under the World Trade Organization Procedures (WTO GPA) of the Trade Agreement
